query: (front-end engineer OR front-end designer OR frontend engineer OR frontend designer OR UI engineer OR UI designer OR front-end developer OR frontend developer OR UI developer OR web developer) site:linkedin.com/jobs/view/ (Singapore OR SG)

jobs.title: Front-End Developer and Graphic Designer
jobs.about_us: Join a growing web development company that creates custom websites for insurance professionals across the U.S. The team values creativity, collaboration, and technical excellence. You’ll work directly with the founders and gain specialized experience in insurance technology while making an immediate impact.
jobs.job_description:
Our client is looking for a Front-End Developer with strong graphic design skills to build visually engaging, user-friendly websites and marketing materials. This role focuses on front-end development, design, and client support, giving you the opportunity to directly impact the online presence of insurance agents nationwide.

Responsibilities
- Design and develop responsive, user-friendly website interfaces
- Create custom layouts, graphics, and visual assets for websites and marketing materials
- Customize WordPress themes (front-end focus) to meet client branding and functionality needs
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility, performance optimization, and mobile responsiveness
- Collaborate with the founding team on design concepts, UX improvements, and brand consistency
- Provide technical and design support to clients, helping them effectively manage and use their websites
- Implement website updates, modifications, and enhancements as requested
jobs.job_requirements:
Requirements
- 4+ years of professional front-end development experience
- Strong graphic design skills (Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, or similar)
- Expertise with WordPress front-end customization (themes, page builders, styling)
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript (front-end technologies)
- Experience with responsive and mobile-first design
- Excellent English communication skills for client interaction
- Ability to work on Mac systems
- Strong attention to detail and confidentiality

jobs.title: Front-End UI/UX Developer (ZR_18746_JOB)
jobs.job_description:
Responsibilities:
- UI/UX Design : Build visually appealing and user-friendly app interfaces.
- Responsive Design : Make the app work well on all devices and screen sizes.
- Code Writing : Write clean and efficient code to turn designs into functional features.
- Testing and Fixing : Identify and fix UI issues to ensure smooth and bug-free operation.
- Performance Boosting : Improve app speed and scalability while keeping the design intact.
- Consistency : Follow design systems or help create a consistent style for the app.
jobs.job_requirements:
Requirements
Experience:
- Proven experience in UI/UX development with a portfolio showcasing a strong understanding of design principles and responsive design.
Technical Skills:
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern UI frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
- Familiarity with UI design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD.
Responsive Design Knowledge:
- Strong understanding of responsive web design techniques and the ability to create apps optimized for various devices and screen sizes.
Coding Best Practices:
- Knowledge of clean, maintainable, and efficient code writing, with experience in version control tools such as Git.
Problem-Solving:
- Ability to troubleshoot and debug UI/UX issues, with attention to detail and a focus on providing optimal solutions.
Performance Optimization:
- Experience in optimizing app performance for speed and scalability, ensuring a smooth user experience.
Design Systems:
- Familiarity with design systems and the ability to adhere to or help create consistent design guidelines.
Collaboration and Communication:
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.
Education:
- A degree in Computer Science, Web Design, or a related field, or equivalent experience.

jobs.title: Senior UI Developer
jobs.about_us: GECO Asia is a specialist IT Consultancy Services company based in Singapore, with two delivery centres in the Philippines. With over 15 years of experience, we have established ourselves as a trusted provider of high-end IT resources in the Asia Pacific marketplace. Our expertise lies in ABCD technologies - Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Cloud Computing and Data Science / Engineering. We deliver next-gen tech solutions that drive digital transformation, optimising efficiency, fostering innovation, and driving competitive advantage for businesses across the region. We are proud recipients of Skillsfuture's Employer Gold Award in October 2023 and Singapore Busines Review's Best Initiative in ICT - Training & Development in May 2023.
jobs.job_description: This is a full-time on-site role for a Senior UI Developer located in Singapore. The Senior UI Developer will be responsible for back-end web development, front-end development, responsive web design, software development, and web development. The role will involve day-to-day tasks related to designing and implementing user interfaces, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.
jobs.job_requirements:
Qualifications
- Back-End Web Development, Front-End Development, Responsive Web Design, and Web Development skills
- Strong knowledge of software development principles and methodologies
- Experience in UI/UX design and implementation
- Experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and related front-end technologies
- Experience in using frameworks and libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development practices
- Understanding of cross-browser compatibility and accessibility standards
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- A bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
Note **We regret that only short-listed applicants will be contacted.**

jobs.title: Intern - Front End Developer
jobs.about_us: As the world moves even more online due to the coronavirus pandemic, customers are connected and empowered like never before. Customers want an immediate, personalized and consistent experience, no matter which channel they choose to engage with a brand. Sprinklr helps brands meet the demands of today’s customers by providing them with the insights they need to make every interaction matter. Sprinklr is a Customer Experience Management (CXM) platform for modern enterprises with 2500+ employees helping the world’s most valuable enterprises make their customers happier. Learn more about our culture and how we make our employees happier through The Sprinklr Way.
jobs.job_description: Sprinklr is looking for Interns who have strong competencies in data structures and algorithms. So, if you desire to work on interesting projects which focus on code solutions that involve research and interactivity, Sprinklr is the best workplace to be in. What Will You Do You will be part of a fast-paced young team, your experience will matter the most and should be genuine and in-depth in subjects you’ve worked on Breathe programming! The role calls for strong programmers who work on emerging business requirements Participate in brainstorming sessions and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms, and products Dive into difficult problems and successfully deliver results on schedule Build reusable code and libraries for future use Tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies.
jobs.job_requirements: What Makes You Qualified Ability to work both independently and in cooperation with others A sense of urgency and ownership over the product Thrives in open or ambiguous environments Great demeanour towards work and people Intellectually curious and inventive.

jobs.title: Front End Developer
jobs.about_us: Join a forward-thinking insurtech company dedicated to redefining how insurance is bought, managed, and experienced. We're building digital-first, customer-centric platforms that deliver transparency, empowerment, and innovation to our policyholders.
jobs.job_description:
We’re looking for a talented Front-End Developer to bring beautifully designed user interfaces to life—especially those integral to insurance workflows such as quote generation, claims management, and policy comparisons. You’ll translate UI/UX designs into high-quality code, ensuring seamless, accessible, and performant user experiences tailored to the strict compliance and clarity demands of the insurance industry.

Job Highlights
Hourly Rate: USD 7.79, the equivalent in your local currency
Paid Hours per Week: 40
Schedule: Fixed Schedule (NY)
Work Arrangement: Work from home
Contract: Independent Contractor
Side note: Since this is a permanent work-from-home position and an “Independent Contractor” arrangement, the candidates must have their own computer and internet connection. They will handle their own benefits and taxes. The professional fees are on hourly rates and the rate depends on your performance in the application process.

Key Responsibilities
- Craft responsive, insurance-specific interfaces such as quote calculators, dashboards, and forms, using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript frameworks.
- Translate UI/UX designs into production-ready front-end code, working closely with UX/design and back-end teams.
- Ensure performance, usability, and responsiveness across web and mobile platforms.
- Implement robust input validation and insurance-specific compliance checks, ensuring accuracy during processes like quoting and claims submission.
- Write clean, maintainable code with accompanying unit and acceptance tests, and participate in code reviews to ensure reliability and reduce regressions.
- Refactor and optimize front-end code to enhance scalability and maintainability, especially relevant for complex forms and dynamic components.
- Stay informed on emerging front-end technologies and regulatory trends affecting insurance UX, such as accessibility standards and data security.
jobs.job_requirements:
Requirements
- 3–5+ years of front-end development experience, with at least 2 years working on insurance or financial services applications.
- Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, with experience in frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
- Strong experience in front-end build tools, such as Webpack, npm/yarn, and deployment systems.
- Familiarity with RESTful APIs integration and version control systems like Git.
- Exceptional attention to detail, especially in UX flows, input forms, and compliance-related UI logic.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills —you’ll work closely with cross-functional teams and adapt fast to changes.

Nice-to-Have
- Understanding of insurance domain concepts, such as underwriting logic, risk calculations, claims workflows, or regulatory guidelines.
- Experience with accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG), ensuring inclusive user access.
- Familiarity with TypeScript or testing frameworks like Jest or Cypress.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.about_us: Join an innovative AI healthcare startup that’s revolutionizing how chronic condition patients navigate the complex US healthcare system. This cutting-edge company combines artificial intelligence with patient care services to create meaningful impact in healthcare delivery. As a lean, fast-moving organization, they’re disrupting traditional healthcare navigation by leveraging AI agents and advanced technologies to quarterback patient needs. The company operates with a strategic focus on high-margin AI products while building a world-class international team.
jobs.job_description: You’ll be at the forefront of healthcare innovation, building sophisticated frontend applications that power AI-driven patient navigation solutions. This role offers the exciting opportunity to work with the latest AI tools and APIs while creating user experiences that directly impact patient care and outcomes. You’ll be part of a core development team building next-generation healthcare technology that helps chronic condition patients navigate complex medical systems with AI-enhanced support.
job_requirements: Extensive experience with AI tools and AI APIs (prioritized over traditional years of experience)
Healthcare industry experience with deep understanding of HIPAA compliance and encryption standards
Proficiency in modern frontend development frameworks and cutting-edge technologies
Strong English communication skills for collaboration with US-based team
Ability to work independently with flexible scheduling in a remote environment
Passion for healthcare innovation and improving patient outcomes through technology

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
jobs.about_us: As a Frontend (Web) Engineer, you will be part of a cross-functional team developing highly scalable and reliable web applications and services used daily by customers and partners. You will collaborate with talented and motivated individuals to shape user-facing experiences and build core functionality that supports business success. Your work will include creating extensible web applications and hybrid online/offline services.
jobs.job_description:
What You'll Do
- Write high-quality, performant, and reliable code while independently handling defined tasks and bug fixes.
- Understand functional specifications and deliver complete features with minimal supervision.
- Participate in the on-call rotation and help resolve incidents within the defined SLA.
- Engage in agile team processes and contribute to their continuous improvement.
- Collaborate with team members to develop scalable and robust progressive web applications.
jobs.job_requirements:
What You'll Need
- Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or a related technical field.
- 4+ years of experience with one or more modern JS frameworks: React (preferred), Angular, or Vue.
- Strong experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Proficiency in TypeScript and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
- Experience with (S)CSS Modules, responsive design, and UI/UX best practices.
- Familiarity with UI frameworks like Ant Design, Bootstrap, or Material Design.
- Experience with client-side state management: Redux, React Context, etc.
- Knowledge of real-time technologies: WebSockets, Socket.IO.
- Experience with testing tools and frameworks: Jest, Enzyme, React Testing Library.
- Proficiency with modern JS ecosystem tools: Webpack, ESLint.
- Solid understanding of modern browser behavior and limitations.
- Knowledge of client-side performance optimization techniques and best practices.

jobs.title: Frontend Engineer Intern (Trust and Safety-Engineering-Data Product & General Service) - 2026 Summer (BS/MS)
jobs.about_us: About TikTok TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok's global headquarters are in Los Angeles and Singapore, and we also have offices in New York City, London, Dublin, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Jakarta, Seoul, and Tokyo. Why Join Us Inspiring creativity is at the core of TikTok's mission. Our innovative product is built to help people authentically express themselves, discover and connect – and our global, diverse teams make that possible. Together, we create value for our communities, inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we work towards every day. We strive to do great things with great people. We lead with curiosity, humility, and a desire to make impact in a rapidly growing tech company. Every challenge is an opportunity to learn and innovate as one team. We're resilient and embrace challenges as they come. By constantly iterating and fostering an "Always Day 1" mindset, we achieve meaningful breakthroughs for ourselves, our company, and our users. When we create and grow together, the possibilities are limitless. Join us. Diversity & Inclusion TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too. TikTok Accommodation TikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations in our recruitment processes for candidates with disabilities, pregnancy, sincerely held religious beliefs or other reasons protected by applicable laws. If you need assistance or a reasonable accommodation, please reach out to us at https://tinyurl.com/RA-request
jobs.job_description: Responsibilities The Trust and Safety (TnS) engineering team is responsible for protecting our users from harmful content and abusive behaviors. With the continuous efforts of our trust and safety engineering team, TikTok can provide the best user experience and bring joy to everyone in the world. Our team is responsible for achieving goals by building content moderation process systems, rule engines, strategy systems, feature engines, human moderation platforms, risk insight systems, and all kinds of supportive platforms across TnS organization. We are looking for talented individuals to join us for an internship in 2026. Internships at TikTok aim to offer students industry exposure and hands-on experience. Turn your ambitions into reality as your inspiration brings infinite opportunities at TikTok. Internships at TikTok aim to provide students with hands-on experience in developing fundamental skills and exploring potential career paths. A vibrant blend of social events and enriching development workshops will be available for you to explore. Here, you will utilize your knowledge in real-world scenarios while laying a strong foundation for personal and professional growth. It runs for 12 weeks. Candidates can apply to a maximum of two positions and will be considered for jobs in the order you apply. The application limit is applicable to TikTok and its affiliates' jobs globally. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis. We encourage you to apply as early as possible. Please state your availability clearly in your resume (Start date, End date). Summer Start Dates: May 11th, 2026 May 18th, 2026 May 26th, 2026 June 8th, 2026 June 22nd, 2026 Online Assessment Candidates who pass resume screening will be invited to participate in TikTok's technical online assessment. Responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams (XFN) including Product Managers, Machine Learning Engineers, Data Scientists, and QAs. Establish public trust by providing solutions to support risk and response business. Focus on escalation handling within the risk and response business.
jobs.job_requirements: Qualifications Minimum Qualifications: Currently pursuing an Undergraduate/Master in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical discipline. Able to commit to working for 12 weeks during Summer 2026. Ability to think critically and to formulate solutions to problems in a clear and concise way. Preferred Qualifications: Strong communication and excellent teamwork skills; being agile and a self-starter.
